group_1.narration: [textBlack:February 14th.@Right now, I'm in Mitakihara City,@and currently full of regret.]

group_1.textCenter: …Why did I go and give it the name Kamihama@Diary?!
It's not like it's only about one city!
If time machines were real I'd go back and@give Past Nagisa a good scolding.

group_1.narration: Like, couldn't you have called it@the Nagisa Diary instead or something?!

group_1.textCenter: (I came here on behalf of the Law of Cycles.)
(But I was so happy to be free that it was hard@to think straight…)
…Ahem.
Actually, now's not even the time to be writing@in the diary.
I can't mess around when things are this serious.@And that's because…

group_1.narration: It's a battlefield for chocolate hunters@looking for discount chocolates!

group_1.textCenter: That's right… Since I, Nagisa, must make do@with a pitiful allowance.
The time after Valentine's is straight up war!

group_1.narration: There are three hours left until@Mami's chocolate party…

group_1.textCenter: (Valentine's Day afternoon…)
(It's time for the sales to begin at the first@set of stores.)
(In truth, I wanted to scope out all the places@around town before Valentine's Day.)
(And take notes on those that seemed like@they wouldn't sell out.)
(…But the thing is, I only made it back to@Mitakihara today!)
(Which is honestly a HUGE disadvantage.)
…Plus, my time for today is limited.
And this war will continue tomorrow and@the day after too!
That's why it's now or never.
If I were a grown-up, then I'd prioritize the@shops selling bulk truffles…
Or the ones offering chocolate cakes.
But my focus will stay on sales that even@kids can afford.
My beloved…
The Valentine's Day exclusive Pink Tapir@chocolate coins…
I've gotta check out if any stores are selling@them for cheap!
